abstract: The return of David C. Duncan Dekker.
snippet: The return of David C. Duncan Dekker.
lead_paragraph: FRIDAY PUZZLE — When we last saw David C. Duncan Dekker (a name that is incredibly fun to say out loud, unless a tour of the New York Times building is passing by your desk, in which case it’s best not to do that, not that I would know), he was doing some mighty heavy lifting, construction-wise, in a pangrammatic Saturday puzzle from March of this year.
